feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas appropriately to enhance readability and clarify the meaning of the sentences.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical choices and grammatical structures, with a focus on conveying complex ideas clearly.

feature3.explanation: Both paragraphs display similar sentence structures in terms of length and complexity, contributing to a coherent flow of ideas.

feature4.explanation: While the topics differ, the tone and mood in both texts suggest an informative and analytical style of writing.

feature5.explanation: There are no spelling or typographical errors in either text, indicating attention to detail in writing.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structures, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, it is moderately likely that the two texts were written by the same author.
